allow: Bash(for file in BrainNode.tsx CreativeNode.tsx DocumentNode.tsx GroupNode.tsx UrlNode.tsx VideoNode.tsx)

Bash(do sed -i 's/className=""h-5 text-xs border-0 bg-transparent p-0 focus-visible:ring-0 font-medium truncate""/className=""h-5 text-xs border-0 bg-transparent p-0 focus-visible:ring-0 font-medium truncate nodrag""/g' "$file")
